input.sentences: this is a summer home where a couple comes to enjoy their summer .
they take walks along the beach .
the scenery is amazing and a sight to see .
there is a lot to do at the beach home | like kayaking .
the little town sits atop a little hill over looking the water .
output.sentences: We rented a beach house for the weekend.
It was so nice to be able to walk out and see the water.
There were so many pretty, natural structures.
I decided to go on a kayak since the water was so calm.
The kayak trip brought me right down the beach and I ended up enjoying the town for the afternoon.
